üéØ Final Clear Showroom Floor 2

üéØ ROOT CAUSE FIXED: The auto-reset function was automatically restoring mock data. This has been disabled in App.tsx.

üîß Console Commands:

Run these commands in browser console (F12):

// Final clear command (auto-reset is now disabled)
localStorage.removeItem('showroomFloor2Cars');
localStorage.removeItem('showroomFloor2Data');
localStorage.removeItem('showroomFloor2Settings');
localStorage.removeItem('showroomFloor2');
localStorage.removeItem('floor2Cars');
localStorage.removeItem('floor2Data');
localStorage.removeItem('showroom2Cars');
localStorage.removeItem('showroom2Data');

// Clear any remaining related keys
Object.keys(localStorage).forEach(key => {
    if (key.toLowerCase().includes('showroom') || 
        key.toLowerCase().includes('floor2') || 
        key.toLowerCase().includes('floor 2') ||
        key.toLowerCase().includes('showroom2')) {
        localStorage.removeItem(key);
        console.log('Removed:', key);
    }
});

// Force reload
window.location.reload();
